<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## sortBy() function

`f`<!-- -->に従ってソートされた配列を返します。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function sortBy(f: (a: any) => unknown, iterable: readonly []): any[];
```

## Example

```ts
sortBy((a) => a, [3, 4, 1, 2, 5, 2]);
// [1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5]
sortBy(
  (a) => a.id,
  [
    { id: 4, name: "foo" },
    { id: 2, name: "bar" },
    { id: 3, name: "lee" },
  ],
);
// [{id:2,name:'bar'}, {id:3, name:'lee'}, {id:4,name:'foo'}]
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/sortBy.ts)
